casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Chaumon Marte WEBB. No. 450P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 24, 2005. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Webb. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of August 2005."
